m_szDocTitle: #1 Tesla Dominates Large Luxury Car Market In US (Updated Figures) | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: #1 Tesla Dominates Large Luxury Car Market In US (Updated Figures) Originally published on EV Obsession . This is a point that I already highlighted in an article approximately a month ago, “ #1 Large Luxury Car In US = Tesla Model S (2015 Sales Comparison) .” Now, however, Tesla* has provided us with its official numbers! Our estimates for US Tesla Model S sales were a tad high for both 2014 and 2015, and the result is that Tesla’s year-over-year growth was even higher than projected. Either way, though, the story is the same: Tesla crushed the competition in the large luxury car market in 20
